ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Sinesis and Sinister came into the base. Megatron is a threat, he is powerful! Sinister said. Yes, but he is one threat we should not destroy. Sinesis

Sinesis and Sinister came into the base.

"Megatron is a threat, he is powerful!" Sinister said.

"Yes, but he is one threat we should not destroy." Sinesis replied. Sinesis
and Sinister walked to Megatron's position.

"Megatron, we have scrapped 2 more bots, to add to the on we have already
destroyed, now, there's something calleed an award, where the bots get
rewarded for loyalty, and maybe get a position in the Predacon army?"
Sinesis said. Sinister nodded.

"Yes, those 3 we destroyed were threats, and we got them good without having
to use any ammo! Here is proof!" Sinister said. He held out his hand,
sitting on his hand were pieces of the internals of Suukie, Lightmare, and
Gangon.

"Behold their inner circuitry!" Sinesis said. They both nodded and smiled,
looking up at Megatron and poking at the wiring in Sinister's hand...
----- Original Message -----
From: "Logo morph" <logomorph@...>

Sent: Friday, June 30, 2000 9:35 AM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> ::KitKat::
>
> She walked up to Megatron.
>
> "HEY, It wasn't all thier fault.  First of all, this bot came out of no
> where.  Second, then two other bot show up tring to slag all three of us.
> then Quickstrike gets injured after putting up one hell of a fight.  It
was
> all Stringtra could do by dragging Quickstrike to safety.  And I did my
best
> to cover them.  But I ran out of ammo.  We barely made it here as it was."
> She just stood there in front of Megatron with no fear in her eyes.
> "Now, let me introduce myself.  I am KitKat, pack member and council.  I
> have lost my pack and wishing to join yours."
